Instruction: Peel and dice the kiwis and avocado.
Finely chop the red onion and cilantro.
In a bowl, combine the diced kiwis, diced avocado, chopped red onion, and chopped cilantro.
Add lime juice and salt to taste.
Gently toss all ingredients together until well combined.
Refrigerate the salsa for at least 30 minutes before serving.
Serve chilled as a refreshing side dish or salsa with chips.
